name: KENO Holdings Inc.
description: Provider of on-demand car wash and detailing service intended to avail car washing services from anywhere. The company's service offers car washing options by downloading an application where users can register themselves, specify their vehicle, and schedule a car wash by making an online payment, enabling vehicle owners to avail car care services directly to their doorstep anywhere, anytime.
one_liner: Provider of on-demand car wash and detailing service intended to avail car washing services from anywhere. The company's service offers car washing options by downloading an application where users can register themselves, specify their vehicle, and schedule a car wash by making an online payment, enabling vehicle owners to avail car care services directly to their doorstep anywhere, anytime.
